Title: Guantanamo by the Bay
Plot: Alan and Denny's political differences again come into play when they defend an innocent man who was held at Guantanamo Bay for 2 years.Meanwhile, upset at the lack of humanity at his private practice, Jerry begs Shirley to give him back his old job, despite having held a knife to her throat the year before.
GuestStars: Bernadette Peters, Leon Russom, Mitch Pileggi, T. J. Ramini
